contents: *Supplementary Provision No. 9999, 2016.03.21. (Enforcement date) This regulation shall be enforced from the date the Korea Sports Council completes registration of establishment, and must be reported to the first board of directors meeting. *Supplementary Provision No. 9999, 2017.04.03. (Enforcement date) This regulation shall come into effect from the date of completion of consultation with the competent ministry after resolution by the Board of Directors.
